pkgmetadata.longdescription: Powerful Algorithm for Maximal Eigenpair // An implementation for using powerful algorithm to compute the maximal eigenpair of Hermitizable tridiagonal matrices in R. It provides two algorithms to find the maximal and the next to maximal eigenpairs under the tridiagonal matrix. Besides, it also provides two auxiliary algorithms to generate tridiagonal matrix and solve the linear equation by Thomas algorithm. Several examples are included in the vignettes to illustrate the usage of the functions.
